scriptedEmail.name: Media Comment
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to users when a comment is made on a media file to which you are subscribed.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($commentAuthorUrl = false) #set($commentAuthorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.Url)
#if ($commentAuthorUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($commentAuthorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.DisplayName #end

$context_v1_email.Context.Comment.Body('Email')
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_NewComment">New comment on {media_name_link}</resource> <resource name="FlagAsAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Footer">You received this notification because you subscribed to comments on the media file. To unsubscribe, {unsubscribe_link}.</resource> <resource name="Footer_FlagAsAbuse">{flag_as_abuse_link}.</resource> <resource name="Subject">{gallery_name}: New Comment on {media_name}</resource> <resource name="Unsubscribe">go here</resource> </language>
